SIGN_HERO_LABEL.desc: Registration message appears above the registration form
SIGN_HERO_LABEL.en_EN: Register with us today to receive regular updates from the RecipeBook fam. Inspiring recipe ideas, the newest food trends, and unique RecipeBook promotions are waiting for you.
SIGN_HERO_LABEL.fr_FR: Inscrivez-vous dès aujourd'hui pour recevoir les mises à jour régulières de RecipeBook. Des idées de recettes inspirantes, les nouvelles tendances culinaires et des promotions RecipeBook uniques vous attendent.
